trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

action.name: Furtive Nibble
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Invade Attire
entries: The rat attempts to enter the clothing or armor of a humanoid creature in its space, forcing it to succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or have the rat become attached to it (remove DC 10).
While attached in this way, the rat has full cover against outside effects, and the target has disadvantage on the first attack it makes each turn.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Gnaw Through
entries: The rat can burrow a Tiny hole through one foot of nonmagical wood in ten minutes, or through one foot of stone or soft metal in one hour.

action.name: Longtooth Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Filth Fever.

action.name: Scrabbling Scale
entries: The rat clambers onto a Large or larger creature in its space, forcing it to succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or have the rat become attached to it (remove DC 12).
A creature the rat is attached to in this way has disadvantage on the first attack it makes each turn.

reaction.name: Deglove Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 2 (1d4) hit points to end the grapple.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Gnaw Through
entries: The rat can burrow a Small hole through one foot of nonmagical wood in ten minutes, or through one foot of stone or soft metal in one hour.

action.name: Chiseltooth Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Filth Fever.

action.name: Scrabbling Scale
entries: The rat clambers onto a Huge or larger creature in its space, forcing it to succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or have the rat become attached to it (remove DC 13).
A creature the rat is attached to in this way has disadvantage on the first attack it makes each turn.

reaction.name: Deglove Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 3 (1d6) hit points to end the grapple.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Gnaw Through
entries: The rat can burrow a Medium hole through one foot of nonmagical wood in ten minutes, or through one foot of stone or soft metal in one hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rat makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Twinchisel Gnaw.

action.name: Twinchisel Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Filth Fever.

action.name: Twitchleap Tackle
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.
A creature hit twice with this attack in a turn must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Earsplitter Battle-Squeak (Recharge 6)
entries: The rat lets out a piercing squeal, forcing each other creature within 5 feet that can hear it to succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be deafened until the end of the rat's next turn.
The first attack made each turn against a creature deafened in this way has advantage.

reaction.name: Deglove Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 4 (1d8) hit points to end the grapple.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Tunnel-Gnawer
entries: The rat can burrow through nonmagical wood, stone, or metal at half its burrow speed, and leaves a Large tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Underminer
entries: When the rat burrows forth from underground, each creature within 5 feet must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rat makes two attacks, one of which it can replace with its Twitchleap Trample.

action.name: Stonegrinder Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Filth Fever.

action.name: Twitchleap Trample
entries: The rat moves up to 10 feet and can enter the space of any Large or smaller creature, forcing each creature whose space it enters in this way to make a DC 14 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice).
On a failure, the target takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away, or is knocked prone if it can't be. On a success, the target moves to the nearest unoccupied space.

action.name: Shatterscreech Squeak (Recharge 6)
entries: The rat lets out a piercing squeak, forcing each other creature within 15 feet that can hear it to succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be deafened for the next minute (save ends at end of turn).
The first attack made each turn against a creature deafened in this way has advantage.

reaction.name: Deglove Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 5 (1d10) hit points to end the grapple.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Medium creature.

trait.name: Tunnel-Gnawer
entries: The swarm can burrow through nonmagical wood, stone, or metal at half its burrow speed, and leaves a Large tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Ratflesh Ruintide
entries: A Medium or smaller creature whose space the swarm leaves for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and dragged with the swarm until the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes up to three attacks with its Devouring Bites, each of which must be against a different target.

action.name: Devouring Bites
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if the swarm has fewer than half its hit points.

action.name: Gnaw to Nothing
entries: The swarm forces each prone creature or corpse in its space to succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 36 (8d8) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.
A corpse or a creature killed by this damage is devoured entirely.

bonus.name: Mounding Wave
entries: The swarm piles itself into a towering wave of ratflesh, gaining the following effects until the beginning of its next turn:

items: The swarm has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.
A prone creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space is grappled (escape DC 15).
The swarm's attacks that target a flying creature have a reach of 20 feet.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature.

trait.name: Fith-Caked Throng
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Filth Fever.
A creature with fewer than half its hit points has disadvantage on this saving throw.

action.name: Frantic Bites
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 16 (6d4 + 1) piercing damage, or 8 (3d4 + 1) piercing damage if the swarm has fewer than half its hit points.

action.name: Gnaw to Nothing
entries: The swarm forces one prone creature or corpse in its space to succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 17 (5d6) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.
A Medium or smaller corpse or a creature killed by this damage is devoured entirely.

reaction.name: Thrashing Mass (1/Day)
entries: When the swarm is reduced below 22 hit points, it can thrash madly, struggling to disentangle itself.
Each other creature in its space must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or fall prone, then 2 (1d4 + 1) street rats that act on the swarm's initiative emerge from it.

trait.name: Marksman's Eye
entries: While no hostile creatures are within 30 feet of it, the archer's ranged attacks score a critical hit on a 19-20.

action.name: Leaden Mallet
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
Instead of dealing damage, the archer can push the target up to 5 feet away.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
On a critical hit, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Skirmish Step
entries: When a hostile creature moves within 5 feet of the archer, the archer can move up to 10 feet away from it.
Opportunity attacks provoked by this movement have disadvantage.

trait.name: Marksman's Eye
entries: While no hostile creatures are within 30 feet of it, the archer's ranged attacks score a critical hit on a 19-20.

action.name: Arming Sword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
On a critical hit, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Patient Nock
entries: The archer steadies its aim and picks its moment. Until the beginning of its next turn, the archer's ranged attacks have advantage.

reaction.name: Skirmish Step
entries: When a hostile creature moves within 5 feet of the archer, the archer can move up to 10 feet away from it.
Opportunity attacks provoked by this movement have disadvantage.

reaction.name: Loose
entries: When a friendly creature the archer can see within 30 feet makes a ranged attack, the archer can make a ranged attack against the same target.
If the archer made no attacks on its previous turn, it can make an additional ranged attack against the same target.

trait.name: Marksman's Eye
entries: While no hostile creatures are within 30 feet of it, the archer's ranged attacks score a critical hit on a 19-20.

trait.name: Windwise
entries: Ranged attacks made by friendly creatures within 30 feet of the archer on the archer's turn do not suffer disadvantage at long range.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archer makes two attacks.

action.name: Arming Sword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Warbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, range 1600 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
On a critical hit, the target is knocked prone and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be dazed.

action.name: Rain Havoc
entries: The archer makes a Warbow attack against each creature in a 10 foot radius centered on a point it can see within 300 feet.
Each of those creatures that is hit by two or more attacks this turn must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Skirmish Step
entries: When a hostile creature moves within 5 feet of the archer, the archer can move up to 10 feet away from it.
Opportunity attacks provoked by this movement have disadvantage.

reaction.name: Snapshot
entries: When a hostile creature moves within 15 feet of the archer, the archer can make a ranged attack with disadvantage against it.

trait.name: Marksman's Eye
entries: While no hostile creatures are within 30 feet of it, the archer's ranged attacks score a critical hit on a 19-20.

trait.name: Cavalier
entries: While mounted, the archer acts on its mount's initiative, rather than its own.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archer makes three attacks with its Dragonhorn Warbow, or two attacks with its Scalebreaker Poleaxe.

action.name: Scalebreaker Poleaxe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning or slashing damage.

action.name: Dragonhorn Warbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 400/1600 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
On a critical hit, the archer can choose one of the following effects:

items.name: Bloodlet Shot
entries: The target begins bleeding (1d4)

items.name: Pinion Shot
entries: The target's speed is reduced by half until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Wingrend Shot
entries: If the target is flying, it takes an additional 5 piercing damage and falls up to 20 feet.

action.name: Distraction Fire
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 400/1600 ft., one target. Hit: The target loses its reaction and gains disadvantage on the first attack it makes before the end of its next turn.

action.name: Five-Fold Volley (1/Day)
entries: The archer makes five attacks with its Dragonhorn Warbow.

trait.name: Marksmen's Eyes
entries: While no hostile creatures are within 30 feet of it, the troop's ranged attacks score a critical hit on a 19-20.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The troop can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the troop can move through any opening large enough for a medium creature. The troop can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Targeted Fire
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (8d8 + 4) piercing damage, or 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage if the troop has fewer than half its hit points.

action.name: Volley
entries: The troop arcs a barrage of arrows toward a 20 foot radius area centered on a point it can see within 300 feet.
Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.
If the troop has half its hit points or fewer, this saving throw is made with advantage.

bonus.name: Pull Back
entries: The troop moves up to half its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature it can see.

bonus.name: Set Stakes
entries: The troop sets sharpened stakes into the ground in up to four 5 foot squares within 10 feet of it, making the ground difficult terrain.
A Large or larger creature that enters one of these spaces takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the creature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, its hit points are reduced to 0. If the creature takes damage from another effect, it dies if the damage equals or exceeds its hit point maximum, otherwise it takes no damage.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk can move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

action.name: Ravenous Scrabble (Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
If three or more ratfolk contributed to this attack, the target has disadvantage on any opportunity attacks it makes this turn.

bonus.name: Scurry Away
entries: The ratfolk moves up to its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the creature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, its hit points are reduced to 0. If the creature takes damage from another effect, it dies if the damage equals or exceeds its hit point maximum, otherwise it takes no damage.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk can move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

action.name: Yellowed Bites (Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 piercing damage.

action.name: Rust-Scrap Cutters (1/Day, Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 slashing damage.
If three or more ratfolk contributed to this attack, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Frothjaw.

bonus.name: Scurry Away
entries: The ratfolk moves up to its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk can move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Breach-Sneak
entries: A creature that is surprised by one or more breach vermin must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for the next minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratfolk makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Steal-Eater Gnaw.

action.name: Steel-Eater Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Makeshift Hackspear
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
On a roll of 1, the weapon breaks and the target takes half the attack's damage, then must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Frothjaw.

action.name: Clawful Wrest
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have one object it is wielding torn from its grasp.

bonus.name: Scurry Away
entries: The ratfolk moves up to its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk can move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Sink-Shot Brace
entries: The ratfolk can spend 20 feet of its movement to brace itself; until the end of its turn, the ratfolk's attacks score a critical on an 18-20 against any target at a lower elevation than it.

action.name: Rot-Tooth Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Clawful Wrest
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or have one object it is wielding torn from its grasp.

action.name: Crudebore Rifle
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.
On a roll of 1, the rifle misfires, dealing 5 (2d4) fire damage to the ratfolk and blinding it until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Scurry Away
entries: The ratfolk moves up to its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature.

bonus.name: Frantic Slamfire
entries: The ratfolk makes a Crudebore Rifle attack with disadvantage.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk can move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Plague Vapors
entries: A non-ratfolk creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the ratfolk must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Frothjaw.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratfolk makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Rot-Tooth Gnaw.

action.name: Rot-Tooth Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

action.name: Plague Censer
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
On a miss, ratfolk immediately makes an additional attack against a randomly selected target in its reach.

action.name: Echoes of the Screaming Bell (Recharge 5-6, 3rd Level Spell)
entries: A maddening chorus of clanging bells rings out from the ratfolk in a 15 foot radius, forcing each other creature in the area to succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (3d8) thunder plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.
A diseased or poisoned creature that fails this saving throw additionally treats all creatures as hostile until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Scurry Away
entries: The ratfolk moves up to its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature.

bonus.name: Scabrous Renewal
entries: If the ratfolk took no damage since the end of its last turn, it can gain 10 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk can move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Havocrage
entries: The ratfolk has advantage on attacks against the last creature to deal damage to it, and has resistance to damage from opportunity attacks provoked by moving directly toward it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratfolk makes two melee attacks, one of which it can replace with a use of its Lunging Leap.

action.name: Bonebreaker Smashclaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.
On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or lose the use of a limb of its choice until it regains all of its hit points.

action.name: Flesh-Fused Ripperspike
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.
A target wielding a shield must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have its shield flung up to 15 feet away.

action.name: Lunging Leap
entries: The ratfolk jumps up to 20 feet, then each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

bonus.name: Scurry Away
entries: The ratfolk moves up to its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk can move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Boomscrap Ammo
entries: When the ratfolk's ratling gun jams, make an unmodified d20 roll. On a 1-5, the gun begins sparking, exploding in a 10 foot radius at the beginning of the ratfolk's next turn.
Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (4d6) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratfolk makes two attacks with its Gun Bash, or makes a Rattling Volley attack against each creature in a 60 foot cone.

action.name: Gun Bash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away.
If the ratfolk made any attacks with its Ratling Volley on its previous turn, this attack deals an additional 2 (1d4) fire damage.

action.name: Ratling Volley
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.
On a roll of 1, the gun jams. The ratfolk immediately ends its turn and any effects of its Spin Up ability end.

bonus.name: Scurry Away
entries: The ratfolk moves up to its speed directly away from the nearest hostile creature.

bonus.name: Spin Up (Recharge 4-6)
entries: For the next minute, whenever the ratfolk uses its Multiattack it makes one additional Ratling Volley attack against a target of its choice, to a maximum of three additional attacks.

name: Ratfolk Screech Thing
languages: understands Squeak Speak but can only scream

trait.name: Stitch-Sick
entries: If the ratfolk takes 10 or more necrotic or poison damage from a single source, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be Poisoned until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Terror-Twisted Rampage
entries: If the ratfolk starts its turn with no allies within 5 feet of it, it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be Frightened and treat all creatures as hostile until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratfolk makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Wormtail Whip.

action.name: Crowdreaper Warscythe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., each target within a 15 foot cone. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Kill-Crash Strike
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.
Any hit with this attack against a prone creature becomes a critical hit.

action.name: Wormtail Whip
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d4 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed up to 15 feet away.

bonus.name: Pain-Mad Screech (Recharge 5-6)
entries: A squeal of mad rage emerges from the ratfolk, forcing each creature within 15 feet of it to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw.
On a failure, a creature must use its reaction to move 15 feet directly away from the ratfolk, or fall prone if it cannot.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire rat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

action.name: Furtive Nibble
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4).

action.name: Invade Attire
entries: The rat attempts to enter the clothing or armor of a humanoid creature in its space, forcing it to succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or have the rat become attached to it (remove DC 10).
While attached in this way, the rat has full cover against outside effects, and the target has disadvantage on the first attack it makes each turn.

A creature the rat is attached to in this way has disadvantage on the first attack it makes each turn.

entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 3 (1d6) hit points to end the grapple.

entries: When the dire wolfrat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

action.name: Scrabbling Scale
entries: The rat clambers onto a Huge or larger creature in its space, forcing it to succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or have the rat become attached to it (remove DC 13).
A creature the rat is attached to in this way has disadvantage on the first attack it makes each turn.

reaction.name: Deglove Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 4 (1d8) hit points to end the grapple.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire rat verminsteed takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Gnaw Through
entries: The rat can burrow a Medium hole through one foot of nonmagical wood in ten minutes, or through one foot of stone or soft metal in one hour.

The first attack made each turn against a creature deafened in this way has advantage.

entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 5 (1d10) hit points to end the grapple.

entries: When the dire quakerat takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The rat may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Tunnel-Gnawer
entries: The rat can burrow through nonmagical wood, stone, or metal at half its burrow speed, and leaves a Large tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Underminer
entries: When the rat burrows forth from underground, each creature within 5 feet must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rat makes two attacks, one of which it can replace with its Twitchleap Trample.

action.name: Stonegrinder Gnaw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Filth Fever.

action.name: Twitchleap Trample
entries: The rat moves up to 10 feet and can enter the space of any Large or smaller creature, forcing each creature whose space it enters in this way to make a DC 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice).
On a failure, the target takes 29 (4d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away, or is knocked prone if it can't be. On a success, the target moves to the nearest unoccupied space.

action.name: Shatterscreech Squeak (Recharge 6)
entries: The rat lets out a piercing squeak, forcing each other creature within 15 feet that can hear it to succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be deafened for the next minute (save ends at end of turn).
The first attack made each turn against a creature deafened in this way has advantage.

reaction.name: Deglove Tail (1/Day)
entries: When the rat is grappled, it can lose 6 (1d12) hit points to end the grapple.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire wolfrat ruin swarm takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Medium creature.

trait.name: Tunnel-Gnawer
entries: The swarm can burrow through nonmagical wood, stone, or metal at half its burrow speed, and leaves a Large tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Ratflesh Ruintide
entries: A Medium or smaller creature whose space the swarm leaves for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and dragged with the swarm until the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes up to three attacks with its Devouring Bites, each of which must be against a different target.

action.name: Devouring Bites
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 30 (5d10 + 5) piercing damage, or 20 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage if the swarm has fewer than half its hit points.

action.name: Gnaw to Nothing
entries: The swarm forces each prone creature or corpse in its space to succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 65 (10d12 + 5) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.
A corpse or a creature killed by this damage is devoured entirely.

bonus.name: Mounding Wave
entries: The swarm piles itself into a towering wave of ratflesh, gaining the following effects until the beginning of its next turn:

items: The swarm has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.
A prone creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space is grappled (escape DC 15).
The swarm's attacks that target a flying creature have a reach of 20 feet.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the swarm of dire rats takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature.

trait.name: Fith-Caked Throng
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be infected with Filth Fever.
A creature with fewer than half its hit points has disadvantage on this saving throw.

action.name: Frantic Bites
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 23 (7d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 14 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage if the swarm has fewer than half its hit points.

action.name: Gnaw to Nothing
entries: The swarm forces one prone creature or corpse in its space to succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 37 (7d10 + 2) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.
A Medium or smaller corpse or a creature killed by this damage is devoured entirely.

reaction.name: Thrashing Mass (1/Day)
entries: When the swarm is reduced below 22 hit points, it can thrash madly, struggling to disentangle itself.
Each other creature in its space must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or fall prone, then 6 (2d6) dire street rats that act on the swarm's initiative emerge from it.
